title: Won my promo, client didn't promo me! Help Please!

embed.description: bubster / Gold 2 100LP / 152W 154L Win Ratio 50% / Zac - 20W 10L Win Ratio 67%, Nidalee - 13W 16L Win Ratio 45%, Lee Sin - 9W 13L Win Ratio 41%, Rek'Sai - 10W 9L Win Ratio 53%, Janna - 10W 8L Win Ratio 56%

body:
The most recent Zac game is the one that got me into my promos from Gold 2 to Gold 1. I have already been in my promos for gold 1, therefore I was rewarded 1 free win. I then queue'd up for my Vi game, which I won. But the client and OP.gg show that I have not played my 2nd game in my promo. I will just play my promos out. Just thought I'd throw a heads up out to Riot. This was right before patch 6.14 last night.

EDIT 1: Won my next game so I promo'd anyways.

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it seems everything functioned normally. It's possible the system had a hiccup and simply didn't apply the Promo Helper immediately. Congrats on your promotion to Gold 1! :)

If you have any more concerns about Promo Helper or what happened here, I recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our specialists.
